metadata.name: Potential AMSI Bypass Script Using NULL Bits
metadata.comment: Detects usage of special strings/null bits in order to potentially bypass AMSI functionalities

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('if(0){{{0}}}'' -f $(0 -as [char]) +')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('#<null>')))

output.summary: Detects usage of special strings/null bits in order to potentially bypass AMSI functionalities
